price: 3. Kaadu Nabii dirabboyseeniih, sinni kalbi fayxi kataaten, ummaan amri umaané takkay maqaané takkay le maral dabqa Qhiyaamah ayró.
arabic: وَكَذَّبُواْ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡۚ وَكُلُّ أَمۡرٖ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wakadhabū wa-ittabaʿū ahwāahum wakullu amrin mus'taqirrun
